headline: BofA Raises Franklin Resources (BEN) PT to $22, Keeps Underperform Rating
summary: Franklin Resources Inc. (NYSE:BEN) is one of the best value stocks to invest in now. On October 2, BofA raised the firm’s price target on Franklin Resources to $22 from $19, while maintaining an Underperform rating on the shares. Given certain market sentiments, BofA increased price targets for all traditional asset managers under its coverage, […]
